62055.「おお！ 待っていたでンスよ！ \n ここまでの道のりを 一緒に歩んできた\n:
Oh! I've been waiting for you.
<pc>, we've walked this road
together, but now the end is in sight!

62056.「じつは ご主人さまを連れ去った\n ゴルゴンザ一味の居場所が わかったでンス。:
I finally learned where Gorgontha and hith
gang shut up our beloved Mathter.

62057.「ゴルゴンザは プクランド大陸の\n メギストリス領にある メギラザの洞くつの\:
Gorgontha's hideout is deep within the
Megilatha Cave. The cave ith located in the
Megithrith Territory in Pukuland.

62058.「そこで 奴は 手下たちに\n 魔界に戻るための門を 作らせているでンスよ。\n:
There, hith underlingth have been working hard
creating a gate to return to the Demon World.
Whath's more, that gate is almostht finished!

62059.「このままじゃ ご主人さまは 魔界に連れ戻され\n 強化薬が量産されて 強化され:
If you don't stop them, Mathter will be taken back to the Demon World, hith elixthir will be math-produced, and the enhanthed Ground
Patrol troops will come to invade Athtoltia...

62060.「ご主人さまの夢は 自らが生み出した\n どうぐ使いが 生まれついての強者……\:
The Mathter's dream ith that hith own Item
Mathter he created will defeat Gorgontha.

62061.「<pc>さん。これが 最後の頼みでンス。\n 隊長ゴルゴンザを 倒してもらえな:
Thith is the latht thing I'll athk from you,
<pc>. Can you help to defeat
Gorgontha? That ith MY dream!

62062.「おお！ ありがたいでンス！\n ボクの夢も ご主人さまの夢も\n ぜんぶ <p:
Oh, thank you! Both of our dreamth are in your
very capable handth!

62063.「魔物を従えた状態で行って\n ゴルゴンザに どうぐ使いの強さを\n 見せつけて:
Take your monthter into battle with you and
show that Gorgontha the true potential of an
Item Mathter!

62064.「おお！ ありがたいでンス！\n ありがたいでンスが…………: Oh! Thank you! Thank you, but...

62065.「<pc>さん 頼まれごとで\n いっぱいでンス。今は 一刻を争う時でンスから\:
It lookth like you have too many taskth right right now. There isn't much time left, tho pleath take care of them ath quickly ath you
can. I'll be waiting for you here!

62066.「そうでンスか……。でも この世界で\n 頼れるのは <pc>さんだけでンス。:
I thee...but you know, you're the only one in
thith world we can count on.

62067.「きっと <pc>さんが来てくれることを\n ご主人さまも 望んでいるはずでンス:
I'm sure that Mathter has placed hith hopes in
you too, and ith waiting for you to come to
him. If you change your mind, I'll be here.

62068.「<pc>さん。これが 最後の頼みでンス。\n 魔物を従えている状態で\n 隊長:
Thith ith the latht favor I'll athk of you.
Go into battle with your monthter and
defeat Captain Gorgonza.

62069.「奴は プクランド大陸の メギストリス領にある\n メギラザの洞くつの最深部に:
Hith hideout is in the depthth of the Megilatha
Cave... You can get there from the
Megithtrith Territory in Pukuland.

62070.「ボクの夢も ご主人さまの夢も\n すべて <pc>さんに託したでンスよ。\n:
I entrusted all my dreams and my master's
dreams to <pc>. Let me remind you of
the strength of the item master.

62071.「隊長殿。ゲートは すでに完成しております。\n そろそろ 魔界へ戻られますか？:
Sir. The gate is already completed. Shall we
return to Demon World now?

62072.「いや 戻るのは まだだ。\n こやつが言う どうぐ使いとやらが\n 来るまで:
No, we're not ready to go back yet. Let's wait
until this item master comes.

62074.「ほほう。お前が どうぐ使いか。\n 待ちかねたぞ。:
I see. You are the item master? I've been
waiting for you.

62075.「魔界を抜け出してまで 極めんとした\n デルクロアの研究成果が\n どれほどの:
I wanted to see the extent of Delcroix's
Research, which he had gone to the extreme of
even escaping from Demon World.

62076.「聞けば デルクロアの夢というのは\n 自らが生み出した どうぐ使いの手で\n:
I heard that Delcroix's dream was to defeat me
with the master item he had created.

62077.「ならば お前を倒し\n その夢を 粉々に打ち砕けば こやつも\n 私の言うこと:
Then, if I defeat you and shatter your dreams,
he will listen to me.

62078.ゴルゴンザは 小さなビンを取り出すと\nそのまま 一気に飲み干した！:
Gorgonza took out a small bottle and downed it
in one gulp!

62079.「ぬぬぬぬ……。アイツめ……。\n ワガハイの強化薬を使うとは 本気だな……。:
Nuh-nuh-nuh... that guy... he's serious when
he uses I's potion...

62080.「どうぐ使い <cs_pchero>よ！\n 今こそ どうぐ使いの真価を見せる時:
Item master <cs_pchero>! Now is the time to
show the true value of item masters! Believe
in the power of the kisama!

62081.「さあ 来い！ どうぐ使い！: Come on, come on! Item master!

62082.「さて どうぐ使いは倒した。\n そろそろ 魔界へ戻るとするか。:
Well, the item master is defeated. It's time
to go back to Demon World.

62083.「ぬぬぬぬ……。もはや これまでか……。: No, no, no... So this is it...

62084.「お……おお。待っていたぞ <cs_pchero>！\n さあ 今度こそ どうぐ:
Oh...oh. I've been waiting for you,
<cs_pchero>! Now let's show him just how
strong an item master can be!

62085.「面白い！ 何度 来ようが\n デルクロアの夢もろとも\n 粉々に 打ち砕いてく:
That's funny! No matter how many times you
come back, you will shatter all of Delcroix's
dreams!

62086.「さあ 来い！ どうぐ使い！: Come on, come on! Item master!

62087.「バ バカな。\n 全力の私が 敗れるなど……。\n どうぐ使い…… これほどの:
Ba...idiot. I, the item master, am defeated by
the power of the item master, but not by this
much.

62088.「デルクロアよ……。\n どうやら 私が まちがっていたようだ。\n お前の研究:
Delcroix, it seems I was wrong. Your research
is quite practical.

62089.「魔界に戻ったら お前専用の研究所を\n 用意すると約束しよう。そこで 好きなだ:
I promise to prepare a laboratory exclusively
for you when you return to Demon World. You
can study items there as long as you like.

62090.「ワガハイ専用の研究所……。\n それが あれば……。: I wish there was a laboratory dedicated to I.

62091.「バカめ。答えは ノーだ。: You idiot. The answer is no.

62092.「なんだと……？\n お前 本気なのか！？: What the hell...? Are you serious?

62093.「ふははは！ 今さら 魔界になど興味ないわ！\n ワガハイの研究を 最大限に活か:
Ha-ha-ha! I have no interest in Demon World after all this time! I've met a native... who will make the most of my
research!

62094.「さあ！ とっとと 逃げ帰って\n 魔界の貴族どもに伝えるのだ！\n これからは:
Come on! Run back and tell the nobles of Demon
World that the time has come! From now on,
this is the Item Master's Era!

62096.「お前は 魔界の大貴族である\n あの方に 反旗をひるがえしたのだ。\n いずれ:
You have rebelled against that great noble of
the Demon World. I will make you regret that
decision...

62097.「これで どうぐ使いこそが最強だという\n ワガハイの考えが 正しいと 証明され:
This proves that I am right in my belief that
item masters are the most powerful.

62099.「……キサマは ワガハイにとって\n じつに すばらしい どうぐであったぞ。: You have been a wonderful tool for I.
